Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
I need to get the attunement crystal running and bond with Icebreaker before It has a meltdown.
Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
A boy with green hair rushes at you with a wrench!
How'd you get onto the grounds!?
Frostblood are blocked by the church magic!
Yeah, I know. I'm the one who put that barrier there.
You?! You're no mage! I see no markings!
In actuality, my sister did it, at my direction.
Y...You expect me to believe that?
You look exactly like one of those Frostbloods that took over the knights of white and ran my city into chaos!
I'm glad you were able to find safety here.
The runes here harness the remaing energy that
There are over twenty and each of them have
The same signature that's on my jacket.
And you look like a boy who has never seen a
Would you like me to be your first? I'll make
I can't promise painless though, that would be
Or rather, would you like to put down that wrench?
You are practically falling over yourself.
Even If I was a real threat, you should of hid
and gauge my strength before attempting an
What you just did was foolish.
If I was hostile, you would have been riddled
Sorry, I'm still trying to decide if that was
an act of cowardice, or bravery.
I wanted to issue a good pummeling but, it wont
Besides, My people were using this place as a headquarters before you were even here. If anything I should suspect you.
I'm just an engineer who stumbled across this place two weeks ago.
And you don't see me pointing my weapon at you.
That is the only one you will get from me.
You said your sister made the rune barriers?
They are very impressive. That level of runecraft is on its own calibur.
Come, I want to show you something. You said you were here before, but I think you missed something.
What is your name by the way?
You can just call me the groundskeeper, with all the cleaning I had to do around here.
Besides the barrier, this place was falling apart.
The Groundskeeper opens a hidden panel.
Self Switch: A B C D
Heh, it actually wasn't that hard.
I knew a huge gateway like this needed a fuse
I also learned that those other sun tiles are actually the power recievers.
I don't know what power source they use but that's where they go.
Wow, we could have used you last time I was here.
Not that it matters probably. The cataclysm will wipe us all out in about 3 days.
That's what I'm here to stop.
Really? If thats true and you're here. My thesis has to be right!
I think this place used to maintain the the astral barrier that shut off 12 years ago!
If we could only understand the writings here, I'd figure we could turn it back on somehow and stop that meteor storm from hitting us!
But I've been here for two weeks and had no luck deciphering the writings.
My sister Lussuria should be able to do it.
Hugh, the world is ending in 3 days how far away is she?
It doesn't matter, I'm going to summon her here.
Ugh who are you talking too?
Hey, why is your sword blinking?
You may want to step back

I haven't forgotten the attunement bond Icebreaker, calm down!

You can be such a baby sometimes!

Self Switch: A B C D
Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
I need to get the attunement crystal running and bond with Icebreaker before It has a meltdown.
Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
These boxes were recently unloaded here.
Why that was suprisingly quick, dear sister.
I nearly didn't have time to finish my hair.
I am just returning the favour for getting me those devil eggs.
Saving Mother and Mistress Flora would not be a bad bonus either!
I've yet to finish my sage tome from studying her biology!
Oh, and before we get started here, Gravis very throuroughly instructed me to, and I quote,
"Drag her selfless arse back home" at the end of our little 3 day quest.
"Drag little majesty's arse back home" at the end of our 3 day quest.
"Drag my shadow back home by the tail" at the end of our 3 day quest.
"Drag our sister's arse back home" at the end of our little 3 day quest.
So do me the favour and don't get killed.
Otherwise who would I have to cover me for my lucrative experiamental "accidents"
Speaking of a lucrative accident, it seems I may have a new test subject.
A good pastime for the magic-less.
Then why are you wasting your time playing with pipes and wires?
Engineers may be a new field where YOUR from. But here in Ouranos they are-
Based on that face, I guess Lucredia and Ouranos isn't so diffrent after all.
Lussuria, go easy on him. He found the fuse for the barrier.
Well then, lets check it out.
So these are the power recievers, like we thought.
Yes, they connect to the fuse, which powers the gateway.
I am assuming the gateway allows the barrier to travel across the world.
But I believe you are correct.
Lovely, does this mean you will set my baths?
Yes actually, I'll set your baths for you miss Lussuria.
I'll even assist in your dressing...
Yeah... Don't like it when people toy with you huh!
You grew that backbone quite quick.
Can we get back on task here?
Sorry, of course sister. The green haired magic-less engineer-
Threw me off. But he did have a good find.
Groundskeeper, I assume you studied the wall?
Is this a question or am I walking into another trap?
Ok, I wrote it down on a little paper. Come to the wall with me.

Snow! Before you go running off full speed,
I would have never thought to check here.
It could use some fortification through.
Give me some time, I'll put something together.
WHAT IS SHE DOING IN THERE!
She better not have destroyed the bath!
I spent a week getting that room running again!
Why'd you put it in the bath?
Are you seriously asking me that, Snow?
A hot bath sounds so nice right now.
Totally worth damning the world for.
Knock yourself out. We are leaving in 3 days no matter what happens.
So, are you two really from another world?
Conversation for later! Back to translating!
Can't you take me with you! I rather not die you know!
You wouldn't survive the teleport. Unfortunately.
We are going to get that astral barrier working Groundskeeper.
The only one who should be worried is Lussuria when she finds out an engineer saved Ouranos.
The bird symbol means Sky, and this little symbol right here...
But the column defines the word in angelic.
Which means, if we want to create some type of translation codex...
Exactly, and thats not the only problem.
Half of this wall is missing.
If we translate whats left of this wall, I learn the logic behind the system here.
I just got here, we have alot to do.
I'll be honest, even a genius like I will have
trouble deciphering this in 3 days but..
I have a competant assistant, way better than
I wanted to ask you a personal favor.
I know there is alot hanging in the balance
You also don't have time to be wandering around.
But.. this might be the only chance I can help
He got mixed in with those pirates a while back
and last I heard something big was happening
Anyways, I fear something bad might of happened
Our home also got destroyed. Not that he lived
I just want to make sure he's alright.
If you find the time, could you help him if
you see him. And tell him I'm here?
I'll see what I can do.
I'll see what I can do.
The way you dodged my swing reminded me of him
He was always quick like that.
I understand, the powersource comes first.
Sorry I asked. You have enough to worry about.
The Groundskeeper quickly stops talking at your presence.
Why don't you ask her yourself?
Don't be shy, maybe she'll let you watch next
Like I said, I was just curious, WHATEVER.
On a serious note, we have your task.
I am certain the astral gateway still works.
And a genius mind to cast the reignition.
But, power is the main thing.
Any idea how we can find a source in 3 days?
Luckily, as I was transitioning here I sensed three very large power sources nearby.
While I was on top of the Owl's nest I saw three places shielded from the winter. I am assuming those are it.
Correct! All you need to do is venture out and bring those sources back to us!
Snow, what places specifically did you see.
The castle of white in the west,
The sage forest in the north,
And a pirate ship in the east.
Three days to clear those three places. It will be close but I think I can do it.
I just need you to learn how to turn on the barrier Lussuria. Think you can manage that?
Why of course sister! Learning a new language within 72 hours is child's play for me!
And I thought I was the sarcastic one.
Just don't get yourself killed, or Gravis will have my head.
After you acquire an orb, send me a signal and I'll teleport you right back!
Lussuria, let's start by cross refrencing the symbols we both currently know. Then we can start a codex.
Alright, that's all we needed to discuss. If I discover anything important I'll give you a ring through Icebreaker's shard.
Have a fun time dear sister, and once again,
I don't know how familiar you are with Ouranos, but if you need me to tell you about some of the threats in those locations, don't hesitate to ask.

We reccomend you go there first.
You are free to go wherever you want, of course.
But, if those pirates sail off, thats on you!

Lussuria puts on a serious face.
The people here are battle hardened, and they
I'll be as smart as time allows.
Dont be pressed into doing something stupid.
If you run out of time, just come back.
I understand the sentiment, but I need to do
I know you feel guilty for what happened to
Aela, but do you really think she would
even want you to be here?
I mean it. How many people in Lucredia would
be devastated if you died here.
Gravis was right. I shouldn't have agreed to
Now are you going to help me or not?
Just don't make me return with a corpse.

We are almost done bonding, one moment!

I... I wasnt peeking I swear, I could barely
Alright, that's all we needed to discuss,
have a fun time dear sister.
